00021 fastMappingIIProcessor::fastMappingIIProcessor(): Processor("fastMappingIIProcessor"),
00022       _moduleTypeChange(this,&fastMappingIIProcessor::moduleTypeChanged),
00023       _moduleLocationChange(this,&fastMappingIIProcessor::moduleLocationChanged),
00024       _moduleConnectionChange(this,&fastMappingIIProcessor::moduleConnectionChanged),
00025       _detectorTransformationChange(this,&fastMappingIIProcessor::detectorTransformationChanged),
00026       _referenceTransformationChange(this,&fastMappingIIProcessor::referenceTransformationChanged),
00027       _stagePositionChange(this,&fastMappingIIProcessor::stagePositionChanged)
00028  {
00029 
00030   _description = "This processor reads calibrated CaliceHits and applies part II of the mapping.";
00031 
00032   registerProcessorParameter("InputCollectionName", "Name of the input collection",
00033                            _inputColName, std::string("CaliceHits999"));
00034                            
00035   registerProcessorParameter("OutputCollectionName", "Name of the output collection",
00036                            _outputColName, std::string("CalorimeterHits"));
00037                            
00038   registerProcessorParameter("ModuleConnectionCollectionName", 
00039                              "Name of the conditions data collection which describes the connection between modules and the DAQ front-ends (folder /CaliceEcal/module_connection)",
00040                              _colNameModuleConnection,
00041                              std::string("ModuleConnection"));
00042 
00043   registerProcessorParameter("ModuleLocationCollectionName", 
00044                              "Name of the conditions data collection which contains the description of the module location (folder /CaliceEcal/module_location)",
00045                              _colNameModuleLocation,
00046                              std::string("ModuleLocation"));
00047 
00048   registerProcessorParameter("ModuleDescriptionCollectionName", 
00049                              "Name of the conditions data collection which contains the description of the module location (folder /CaliceEcal/module_description)",
00050                              _colNameModuleDescription,
00051                              std::string("ModuleDescription"));
00052 
00053   registerProcessorParameter("DetectorTransformationCollectionName", 
00054                              "Name of the conditions data collection which contains the detetcor transformation",
00055                              _colNameDetectorTransformation,
00056                              std::string("DetectorTransformation"));
00057 
00058   registerProcessorParameter("ReferenceTransformationCollectionName",
00059                              "Name of the conditions data collection which describes the position and rotation of the reference coordinate system (folder e.g. /Calice/ECAL/Transformation)",
00060                              _colNameReferenceTransformation,
00061                              std::string("ReferenceTransformation"));
00062 
00063   registerOptionalParameter("StageCollectionName",
00064                             "Name of the conditions data collection which contains stage position data",
00065                             _colNameStageCollection,
00066                             std::string("StageCollectionNotDefined"));
00067 
00068   registerProcessorParameter("ViewMapping", 
00069                              "View the mapping between channels and modules when ever the module location or module connection conditions data change (set to 0 or !=0)",
00070                              _viewConnectionTree,
00071                              0);
00072 }

00074 
00075 void fastMappingIIProcessor::init() {
00076 
00077   std::stringstream message;
00078   message << "fastMappingIIProcessor: undefined conditionsdata: ";
00079   bool error = false;
00080   try {
00081     if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( &_moduleLocationChange,_colNameModuleLocation)) {
00082       message << " " << _colNameModuleLocation;
00083       error=true;
00084     }
00085 
00086     if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( &_moduleConnectionChange, _colNameModuleConnection)) {
00087       message << " " << _colNameModuleConnection;
00088       error=true;
00089     }
00090 
00091     if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( &_moduleTypeChange, _colNameModuleDescription) ) {
00092       message << " " << _colNameModuleDescription;
00093       error=true;
00094     }
00095 
00096     if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( &_detectorTransformationChange, _colNameDetectorTransformation) ) {
00097       message << " " << _colNameDetectorTransformation;
00098       //error=true;
00099     }
00100     if(_colNameStageCollection != "StageCollectionNotDefined") {
00101       if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( &_stagePositionChange ,_colNameStageCollection) ) {
00102       message << " " << _colNameStageCollection;
00103       //error=true;
00104       }
00105     }  
00106   }
00107   catch (ErrorMissingConditionsDataHandler &conddata_error) {
00108     // --- catch conditions data handler registration errors
00109     //   ... and build a combined error message.
00110     std::string a(conddata_error.what());
00111     error = true;
00112     if (a.size()>0) {
00113       a.erase(a.size()-1);
00114       message << a; 
00115     }
00116   }
00117   if (error) { 
00118     message <<  ".";
00119     throw ErrorMissingConditionsDataHandler(message.str());
00120   }
00121   _mapping.init();
00122   _mapping.setViewConnectionTree(_viewConnectionTree!=0);
00123   printParameters();
00124 }

00128 }

00130 
00131 void fastMappingIIProcessor::processEvent(LCEvent* evt) {
00132 
00133   try {
00134     LCCollection* inVector = evt->getCollection(_inputColName);
00135     LCCollectionVec* _outputCol = new LCCollectionVec(LCIO::CALORIMETERHIT);
00136     EVENT::LCParameters & theParam = _outputCol->parameters();
00137    
00138     float avgTemp = inVector->parameters().getFloatVal(string("avgTemp"));
00139     theParam.setValue( "avgTemp", avgTemp );
00140 
00141     vector<float> dummy;
00142     theParam.setValues( "avgModTemp_value",
00143                         inVector->parameters().getFloatVals(string("avgModTemp_value"),dummy)
00144                      );
00145     vector<int> intdummy;
00146     theParam.setValues( "avgModTemp_moduleNumber",
00147                         inVector->parameters().getIntVals(string("avgModTemp_moduleNumber"),intdummy)
00148                      );
00149 
00150     //Set the cell decoder which might be useful in event displays
00151     //suggested by Allister
00152     // 0 <-> CellID0, 32 <-> CellID1
00153     theParam.setValue(LCIO::CellIDEncoding,HcalCellIndex::getEncodingString(0) + "," + HcalTileIndex::getEncodingString(32));
00154     // write 3d coordinates
00155     LCFlagImpl hitFlag(_outputCol->getFlag());
00156     hitFlag.setBit(LCIO::RCHBIT_LONG);
00157     // CellID1 is only stored if the flag word (bit CHBIT_ID1) of the collection is set.
00158     hitFlag.setBit(LCIO::CHBIT_ID1);
00159     _outputCol->setFlag(hitFlag.getFlag());
00160 
00161     for (int i = 0; i < inVector->getNumberOfElements(); i++) {
00162       RawCalorimeterHit* aRawCalorimeterHit = dynamic_cast<RawCalorimeterHit*>(inVector->getElementAt(i));
00163       
00164       if (!aRawCalorimeterHit) {
00165         std::stringstream message;
00166         message << "Collection " 
00167                 << _inputColName 
00168                 << " doesn't contain RawCalorimeterHits/FastCaliceHits" 
00169                 << std::endl;
00170         throw runtime_error(message.str());
00171       }  
00172       
00173       FastCaliceHit* oldHit = new FastCaliceHit(aRawCalorimeterHit);
00174 
00175       unsigned _moduleIndex = _inverseModuleMap[oldHit->getModuleID()];
00176       unsigned _cellIndex = oldHit->getChannel() + oldHit->getChip() * 18;
00177       if (_cellIndex>107) _cellIndex=_cellIndex-108;  
00178       ThreeVector_t _myPos = _mapping.getPosition(_moduleIndex, _cellIndex);
00179       CalorimeterHitImpl* aCalorimeterHit = new CalorimeterHitImpl();
00180       aCalorimeterHit->setCellID0(_mapping.getGeometricalCellIndex(_moduleIndex, _cellIndex));
00181       aCalorimeterHit->setCellID1(HcalTileIndex(_mapping.getModuleID(_moduleIndex),oldHit->getChip(),oldHit->getChannel()).getIndex());
00182       aCalorimeterHit->setEnergy(oldHit->getEnergyValue());
00183       aCalorimeterHit->setTime(oldHit->getTimeStamp());
00184       aCalorimeterHit->setPosition(_myPos.data());
00185 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00186       HcalCellIndex ci(aCalorimeterHit->getCellID0());
00187       std::cout << "Hit: " << std::setw(2) << oldHit->getChip() << " " << 
00188         std::setw(2) << oldHit->getChannel() << " " << 
00189         std::setw(3) << _cellIndex << " " <<
00190         std::hex << std::setw(8) << aCalorimeterHit->getCellID0() << std::dec << " " <<
00191         std::setw(3) << ci.getLayerIndex() << " " <<
00192         std::setw(3) << ci.getTileColumn() << " " << 
00193         std::setw(3) << ci.getTileRow() << " " <<
00194         std::setw(7) << aCalorimeterHit->getEnergy()  << " " << 
00195         std::setw(7) << aCalorimeterHit->getPosition()[0] << " " << 
00196         std::setw(7) << aCalorimeterHit->getPosition()[1] << " " <<
00197         std::setw(7) << aCalorimeterHit->getPosition()[2] << std::endl; 
00198 #endif
00199       _outputCol->addElement(aCalorimeterHit);  
00200 
00201       delete oldHit;
00202       
00203     }
00204     evt->addCollection(_outputCol, _outputColName);
00205   }
00206   catch (DataNotAvailableException &e) {
00207 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00208       std::cout << "mappingIIProcessor::processEvent(): data not available exception" << std::endl;
00209 #endif
00210   }
00211 }

00215 
00216 }

00219 void fastMappingIIProcessor::end() {
00220

00223 
00224 void fastMappingIIProcessor::updateInverseMap() {
00225   _inverseModuleMap.clear();
00226   for (unsigned _moduleIndex = 0;  _moduleIndex < _mapping.getNModules(); _moduleIndex++) {
00227     _inverseModuleMap[(_mapping.getModuleID(_moduleIndex) << 8) + 
00228                       (unsigned short)_mapping.getModuleType(_moduleIndex)-4] = _moduleIndex;      
00229   }
00230 }
